titleStmt.title: The ceremonies of the vacant see, or, A true relation of what passes at Rome upon the pope's death with the proceedings in the conclave, for the election of a new pope, according to the constitutions and ceremonials, as also the coronation and cavalcade / out of the French by J. Davies of Kidwelly.
Ceremoniale historico e politico. Part 5. English
titleStmt.author: Leti, Gregorio, 1630-1701.

titleStmt.title: The ceremonies of the vacant see, or, A true relation of what passes at Rome upon the pope's death with the proceedings in the conclave, for the election of a new pope, according to the constitutions and ceremonials, as also the coronation and cavalcade / out of the French by J. Ceremoniale historico e politico. Part 5. English

notesStmt.note: Epistle dedicatory dated: Jan 7, 1671, J. Davies.
"Translated from a French version of an unidentified work by Gregorio Leti which was subsequently incorporated in pt. 5 of his 'Il Ceremoniale historico, e politico.'" -- cf. BM
